metadata.title: CVE-2017-16641 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/rrd.php in Cacti 1.1.27 allows remote authenticated administrators toexecute arbitrary OS commands via the path_rrdtool parameter in anaction=save request to settings.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16641` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.1.38+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.38+ds1-1').
